casebody.data:
No. 09-1212. Norfolk Southern Railway Company, Petitioner v. Billy Groves, Individually, dba Savannah Re-Load, et al. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 379,

178 L. Ed. 2d 15,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6178. October 4, 2010.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Same case below, 586 F.3d 1273.
